descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Courier New][size=4]INSTALLATION[/size][/font][/b]

[b][font=Verdana][size=3]Mods used:[/size][/font][/b]

[b]I recommend [u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17609/?]Relighting Skyrim (Exteriors and Interiors)[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]ELFX (ONLY the EnhancedLightsandFX.esp, NO OPTIONALS)[/url][/u], with vanilla Skyrim weathers. You can freely use other lighting mods or weather mods, but your game will appear different than mine.[/b]

[b]Mods seen in the screenshots are from:[/b]
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42492/?]Realistic Sun for Climates of Tamriel and Vanilla (using the Vanilla version)[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?]
Realistic Water Two (with ENB textures) [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45807/?]NobleSkyrimMod HD-2K[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45807/?] [/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607/?]Skyrim HD[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?]Static Mesh Improvement Mod[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13429/?] Designs of the Nords[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23352/?]Better Embers[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/571605/?] The aMidianBorn mods by CaBaL120[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6948840/?tb=mods&pUp=1]The "Realistic" mods by HalkHogan[/url]
[/b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5712421/?][b]The Rustic mods by Gamwich[/b][/url]

If you intend to use any Night Eye effects in your play-through, you will also need [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50731/?][b]Enhanced ENB Night Eye[/b][/url][b]. [/b]Only one of the .ESP files is necessary.[b]
[/b]

[b][font=Verdana][size=3]Installing the ENB:[/size][/font][/b]

[b]1. [/b][font=Verdana]Download the [/font][url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html]latest ENB binary files[/url]
[b]
2. [/b][font=Verdana]Extract [/font][b]d3d9.dll, [/b][b]enbhost.exe, and enblocal.ini[/b][font=Verdana] to your Skyrim folder (NOT the Data folder).[/font]
[b]
3. [/b][font=Verdana]Download the preset .zip file provided, extract all files to the Skyrim folder.[/font]
[b]
4. [/b][font=Verdana]Edit [/font][b]enblocal.ini[/b][font=Verdana] with regard to your PC specs and preferences, [/font][url=http://wiki.step-project.com/Guide:ENBlocal_INI]help doing so can be found here[/url]. [b]Ensure FixGammaTint is set to true.[/b]
[b]
5. [/b][font=Verdana]Ensure you have the following in your [/font][b]SkyrimPrefs.ini[/b][font=Verdana]:[/font]
[b]bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
iBlurDeferredShadowMask=3[/b]

[b]If you need a performance boost, toggle off Subsurface Scattering and Ambient Occlusion (via the ENB menu, which you can open with Shift+Enter).[/b]

[b][font=Courier New][size=4]CREDITS
[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana]Boris Vorontsov, creator of ENBSeries: [/font][url=http://enbdev.com/]ENB Series[/url][/b]
author: Querns
